Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-55131 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-11
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-55131 affecting package nodejs18 for versions less than 18.20.3-11. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nodejs18 is earlier than 18.20.3-11, affected by CVE-2025-55131
